input.sentences: our visit to the chinese festival was fun .
there were banners all around the city .
shopkeepers had lots of displays up and available for sale .
the artwork on them was beautiful .
some people were wearing outfits from an older time .
output.sentences: Towns folk raised banners and decorated the town.
Some vendors took advantage of the crowd hoping to make some extra money.
Phung does some great handcrafted work.
There are plenty of ways for tourists to experience the culture.
